item.title: OpenStack Generic Group and Consistent Group
item.description: References https://docs.openstack.org/cinder/latest/admin/blockstorage-groups.html https://docs.openstack.org/cinder/latest/contributor/groups.html Consistent Group For a group to support consistent group snapshot, the group specs in the corresponding group type should have the following entry: 1 {'consistent_group_snapshot_enabled': <is> True} Similarly, for a volume to be in a group that supports consistent group snapshots, the volume type extra specs would also have the following entry: 1 {'consistent_group_snapshot_enabled': <is> True} Cinder Cli Microversion The minimum microversion to support group type and group specs is 3.
